verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: Trump] [V: directs] [ARG1: government] [ARG2: to investigate whether tariffs are needed on imports of autos , trucks] .
WASHINGTON ( AP ) — Trump directs [ARG0: government] to [V: investigate] [ARG1: whether tariffs are needed on imports of autos , trucks] .
WASHINGTON ( AP ) — Trump directs government to investigate whether tariffs [V: are] needed on imports of autos , trucks .
WASHINGTON ( AP ) — Trump directs government to investigate whether [ARG1: tariffs] are [V: needed] [ARGM-PNC: on imports of autos , trucks] .
